testsuite.name: TasklistTest
testsuite.system-out:
?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Input an action (add, print, end): > input The input action is invalid Input an action (add, print, end): > task The input action is invalid Input an action (add, print, end): > The input action is invalid Input an action (add, print, end): > 123 The input action is invalid Input an action (add, print, end): > The input action is invalid Input an action (add, print, end): > end Tasklist exiting! ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m Input an action (add, print, end): > print No tasks have been input Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > The task is blank Input an action (add, print, end): > print No tasks have been input Input an action (add, print, end): > end Tasklist exiting! ?[1;31m Start test 3?[0m Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > See my dentist on 14/1/22 > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Supermarket > Chocolates > flour > oranges > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Change site > Use Christmas theme > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Buy book > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Fix printer > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Cinema: get tickets > Check movie reviews > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Present for friend birthday > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Check new software > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Pay phone bill > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Fill car tank > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Buy flowers > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Pay water bill > Input an action (add, print, end): > print 1 See my dentist on 14/1/22
2 Supermarket Chocolates flour oranges
3 Change site Use Christmas theme
4 Buy book
5 Fix printer
6 Cinema: get tickets Check movie reviews
7 Present for friend birthday
8 Check new software
9 Pay phone bill
10 Fill car tank
11 Buy flowers
12 Pay water bill
Input an action (add, print, end): > end Tasklist exiting! ?[1;31m Start test 4?[0m Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Fix printer > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Cinema: get tickets > Check movie reviews > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Present for friend birthday > Input an action (add, print, end): > add Input a new task (enter a blank line to end): > Check new software > Input an action (add, print, end): > print 1 Fix printer
